Araber: [Ohi pulls and tugs at his bonds, with no success.]
[Ohi begins to cut with the scissor the straps]
[The doctor turns to the syringe into his hand, hesitates.]
[The doctor comes up to Ohi, pushes him the syringe into his neck.]
[You can hear a fast Heartbeat who stops slowly. Everything is black.]
[Ohi begins to cut with the scissor the straps. Sometime the first one is cut, the second strap he solves with his free hand.]
[He sits back, he keeps the scissor in his hand.]
[In the same sequence as the doctor "use 1" (Ohi crashes).]
[Ohi manages to fold up the footrests with his feets. He does not have full control over his feets, he succeeds only with the greatest effort and luck.]
[Ohi is trying to move from that place, moves with the upper body fourth and back. But therefore also the chair moves  back and forth and ultimately remains standing in the same place.]
[Ohi "pulls himself with his feets forward" and reaches the rolling table. He looks into the bowl.]
[Ohi scans despite his bound arm for the scissors and manages to touch them with his fingertips. He pulls it to him, and finally has it in his hand.]
[The doctor turns to the syringe into his hand, hesitates.]
Bientôt tout cela sera du passé.
[The doctor comes up to Ohi, he takes the scissor out of his hand, puts it away, and then he pushes the needle into his neck.]
[You can hear an excited heartbeat that in the end stops. Everything is black. *** Ohio is dead sequence begins again ***]
[Ohi scans despite his bound arm for the scissors and manages to touch them with his fingertips. He pulls it to him, and finally has it in his hand.]
[Ohi pushed himself with his feets back to the starting position. He keeps the scissor in his hand (idle).]
[The scissor willö be added the same time as item to the inventory.]
Une paire de ciseaux ! Peut-être une chance.
[The doctor raises his syringe, gets closer. Ohis hand seahrches for the empty syringe on the floor.]
[Ohis hand found the syringe.. He picks the scissor and sticks it in the cheek of the doctor.]
[The Doctor staggers back, loses his syringe, holding his cheek.]
[Ohis sight is getting smaller, he is about to faint. His heart beats loudly.]
[You can see how the doctor is suddenly being hit from behind and collapses. A shadow is approaching Ohi, he can not see anymore. Fade out.]
[The section is finished, fade out. Ohis heart beats on, calm down slowly. Next in the Salon section 9]
[*** END OF SECTION*** PLEASE START SECTION 9*** END OF SECTION ***]
J'en ai toujours dans mon sac. Juste au cas où.
Vous étiez censé être endormi. Je ne suis pas un monstre, vous savez ?
Je... Je n'ai rien contre vous. Absolument rien !
Mais... Que puis-je faire d'autre ? VOUS me forcez la main.
C'est de votre faute ! Uniquement la vôtre.
Pourquoi la baronne avait-elle besoin de fouiner partout ?
Et ce gant là-bas ? Vous vouliez l'utiliser comme preuve contre moi, ja ?
J'ai laissé aucune preuve. Aucune piste. Et pourtant, vous ne pouvez pas me laisser tranquille.
[The Doctor stops working, and leans with his arms on the cabinet (idle).]
[The player takes control, can move Ohi.]
Une insuffisance cardiaque arrive souvent à votre âge. Surtout compte tenu de vos antécédents.
Je me demande encore si je dois vous jeter par-dessus bord. Pour ne laisser aucune trace ! Aucune preuve...
Mon plan était parfait ! Et VOUS avez tout gâché !
[Ohi sits tied and helpless in a wheelchair (idle). The doctor is at one of the cabinets and is doing there something with a syringe (idle).]
[Ohi comes slowly to himself. He notes that he is tied up and tries to free himself. He does not succeed.]
[The doctor noticed that Ohi's awake. He talks overthe shoulder with him, stop working (idle).]
Pourquoi ne pouviez-vous pas simplement laisser tomber ?
[The doctor looks forward again, lowering his head.]
[The doctor spins around, is lightning fast on the wheelchair, leaning on the armrests and is with his face close to Ohi (idle).]
Vous ignorez ce que vous me forcez à faire ?!
[The doctor is aware of how he behaves. He gets up, picks perhaps Ohis clothes, getting up himself.]
Tout sera bientôt terminé. Vous ne vous sentirez rien.
Je suis navré que vous deviez assister à tout cela. J'aurais dû utiliser plus de chloroforme.
[The doctor goes back to the closet, makes something (idle).]
[The doctor raises his syringe, gets closer.]
[Ohi tries to fight but he is weak, the doctor presses his arms to the side and pushes him the syringe into the neck.]
[Fade out. Ohis heart beats a few times out loud ... then it stops beating. Pause, then continue with "Wiedereinstieg_nach_Tod_Boden".]
[The doctor goes back to the closet, makes something (idle).]
[Ohi is back in the wheelchair, scissor in his hand, foot rests above.]
[Ohi gets up unsteadily from the wheelchair, takes a step to the doctor and takes the scissor. He crashed forward. He is too weak and he is too dizzy to walk.]

[As his falls Ohi loses the scissors and tears a bowl of swabs, etc. but also with an empty syringe from the cabinet. The content is falling to the floor. The doctor spins around, looks at Ohi(idle).]
[The doctor turns around, takes the syringe and then turns to Ohi.]
[Ohi is trying to get away from the doctor. He can not. He manages only to press up his back against the wall.]
[Cut. The camera is close on Ohi at the cabinet wall.]
[You can see how the doctor comes to Ohi and kneel in front of him.]
Se jeter sur le Dr. Gebhardt
[The Doctor stops working, and leans with his arms on the cabinet (idle).]
[The player takes control, can move Ohi.]
[The Doctor stops working, and leans with his arms on the cabinet (idle).]
[The Doctor stops working, and leans with his arms on the cabinet (idle).]
[The player takes control, can move Ohi.]
Dr. Gebhardt... n'en aura plus pour longtemps...
[Dialogue between Ohi and the doctor begins.]
Bon, peu importe. Je suis prêt.
[The doctor turned back briefly, takes the syringe.]
[The doctor gets close to Ohi at the rolling table, presses him the syringe into his neck.]
[Everything is black. Fade-out. Continue with the sequence "Wiedereinstieg_nach_Tod".]
[The doctor raises his syringe, gets closer.]
[Ohi tries to fight but he is weak, the doctor presses his arms to the side and pushes him the syringe into the neck.]
[Fade out. Ohis heart beats a few times out loud ... then it stops beating. Pause, then continue with "Wiedereinstieg_nach_Tod_Boden".]
[Ohi gets up unsteadily from the wheelchair, takes a step to the doctor and takes the scissor. He crashed forward. He is too weak and he is too dizzy to walk.]
[Ohi tries to hold himself. During the crash he tears down a cloth on which was a bottle with chloroform. The bottle breaks.]
[Also Ohi tears down a bowl with swabs, wooden spatulas, etc., but also with an empty syringe from the cabinet. The content is falling to the floor. The doctor spins around, looks at Ohi(idle).]
[The doctor turns around, takes the syringe and then turns to Ohi.]
[Ohi is trying to get away from the doctor. He can not. He manages only to press up his back against the wall.]
[The Chloroform slowly makes effect on Ohi. You can hear his heart beat louder and its field of view is always smaller. He approaches the unconscious.]
[Cut. The camera is close on Ohi at the cabinet wall.]
[You can see how the doctor comes to Ohi and kneel in front of him.]
